alert.note: Alert for Big Island East; Big Island North; Kauai East; Kauai North; Kohala; Koolau Windward; Maui Central Valley North; Maui Leeward West; Maui Windward West; Molokai North; Molokai West; Molokai Windward; Niihau; Oahu North Shore; Olomana; Windward Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued December 30 at 3:50AM HST until December 30 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR NORTH AND EAST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI MAUI AND THE BIG ISLAND... ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR EXPOSED WEST FACING SHORES OF MAUI AND THE BIG ISLAND... .The large north (010-020 deg) swell has peaked and will slowly subside through the day today. A new large northwest swell (320) will fill in late tonight and Sunday. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Large breaking waves of 14 to 18 feet for north facing shores, 10 to 14 feet for east facing shores, 8 to 12 feet for West Maui, and 6 to 8 feet for northerly exposures of leeward Big Island north of Keahole Point. * WHERE...Portions of Kauai, Maui, Molokai, Niihau, Oahu and the Big Island. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST this evening. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Strong breaking waves and strong currents will make swimming dangerous.
info.instruction: Head all advice from ocean safety officials. When in doubt, don`t go out.
